message.body: Hey Brenda! Sorry if this is pretty random but would you happen to know anything about the Summer Business institute at Nova?
Yup! I applied and got accepted but I'm not sure about it.
Do you know a lot about it?
I don't know too much. You have to take intro courses in the major business topics ( accounting, marketing, ect.). I've heard it's pretty intense and a lot of people's gpas went down from it.
Oh crap! Are you serious? I kind of expected it to be intense because you're fitting a minor into one summer but I don't want it to touch my gpa...
Would it since you already graduated?
I think it will because I talked to the contact person for the program. I wonder if I can opt out of that and just get the minor if I pass.
I doubt it though hahah. Hey, if i do it i might get to see you at the Clay Center :) How have you been? How's work?
Good. Things are winding down a bit. How are you
Kind of stressed. This SBI thing is confusing and I'm at a lost :( I hope you get to relax a bit now now that the school year is almost over!
